roles.name: System Administrator
roles.description: Full administrative access to AdamRMS backend, including role and security policy management.
roles.permissions: audit:events:export, auth:mfa:reset, auth:roles:read, auth:roles:write, auth:users:read, auth:users:write

roles.name: Project Manager
roles.description: Manage projects and crew assignments with elevated read/write permissions but limited security scope.

roles.name: Security Auditor
roles.description: Read-only visibility into audit and security events for compliance reviews.

roles.name: Operations Viewer
roles.description: Baseline read-only access to operational data without security-sensitive permissions.

checklist: - [x] JWT signing and expiration policies defined.
- [x] Refresh token store hashes token values and enforces revocation.
- [x] MFA flows implemented with TOTP and enforced for high privilege roles.
- [x] Security roles migrated to dedicated tables (`security_roles`, `security_role_permissions`).
- [x] Audit trail persists events and forwards high severity alerts.
- [x] Monitoring integration produces JSONL alerts for external consumers.
